snippet.title: Kirby's Avalanche - Full Game Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Enjoy my Gameplay of Kirby's Avalanche - Full game walkthrough. This includes every encounter in the story mode. Kirby's Avalanche is a Kirby Adaptation of popular japanese puzzle game "Puyp Puyo". 
This one was tough as nails, so please enjoy.

►Timecodes

00:00 - Title Screen

Learning Stages:
00:30 - Waddle Dee
02:09 - Bronto Burt
04:04 - Waddle Doo

Normal Difficulty:
06:07 - Poppy Bros. Sr.
07:42 - Whispy Woods
09:33 - Kabu

Hard Difficulty:
11:16 - Broom Hatter
12:51 - Squishy
15:24 - Lololo & Lalala
17:59 - Bugzzy
19:06 - Paint Roller
20:54 - Heavy Mole
22:15 - Mr. Shine & Mr. Bright
23:44 - Kracko
26:05 - Meta Knight
28:15 - King Dedede (Final Boss)

30:09 - Ending & Credits 

►Game Informations:
▪Developer: Compile, Banpresto
▪Publisher: Nintendo
▪Director: Kazunori Ikeda
▪Producers: Masamitsu Niitani
▪Composer: Akiyoshi Nagao
▪Series: Kirby, Puyo Puyo
▪Platform: Super NES
▪Release dates:
- PAL: February 1, 1995
-NA: April 25, 1995
▪Genre: Puzzle
▪Modes: Single-Player, Multi-Player
▪Playtime: +2h
